metadata.title: CVE-2020-25669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the Linux Kernel where the functionsunkbd_reinit having been scheduled by sunkbd_interrupt before sunkbd beingfreed. Though the dangling pointer is set to NULL in sunkbd_disconnect,there is still an alias in sunkbd_reinit causing Use After Free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
